p: Coccoloba alnifolia mature leaves were harvested on May 2015 from a specimen located at the Parque das Dunas, Natal, RN, Brazil (UTM zone 250257315 m E 9357108 m N—GPS Garmin Etrex). This region corresponds to the Atlantic Forest biome. After identification, a voucher was deposited in the UFRN Herbarium with number: UFRN 17133. The research was registered at SISBIO no. 54064-1, SISGEN no. A39FD4C.
